import React, { Component } from 'react' import ProductService from '../../../service/product.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' class EditProductForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { name: this.props.name, price: this.props.price, category: this.props.category, imgURL: this.props.imgURL } this.productService = new ProductService() } handleInputChange = e => { const {name, value} = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() this.productService.updateProduct(this.props._id, this.state) .then(() => this.props.finishProductPost()) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { con return (

Edit Product

Name Price Category URL-image
) } } export default EditProductForm
